description:
Hina is a ghost who was born in 1906 Japan (Meiji Era) and now works at the cafe run by http://anidb.net/ch80571 [Anzu]`s http://anidb.net/ch85090 [mother]. She is very shy towards others as shown when http://anidb.net/ch76922 [Makoto], http://anidb.net/ch79785 [Kei] and http://anidb.net/ch79784 [Chinatsu] visit the cafe.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hina
